meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Andrea Keleher Daniel Watkins Kristin Sausville Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7028.

td.p: Andrea Keleher, a medical records coder from Denver, Colorado
Daniel Watkins, a music teacher from Fort Worth, Texas
Kristin Sausville, a stay-at-home mom from Newark, Delaware (whose 5-day cash winnings total $94,201)

tr.td: WHO'S DRIVING THIS THING?!
WORDS BORROWED FROM INDIA
LAND "HO"!
INTERNATIONAL CRIME DICTIONARY
BAR SOAP
LAUGHABLE TELEVISION

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Kristin
Daniel
Andrea

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Daniel] You got \'em both, way to go. Music teacher, all right. Pays off.)
...
(Alex: [To Kristin] She got Bach, but Brahms was a lot later.)
DanielWho are J.S. Bach & G.F. Handel?
$6,400
KristinWho are J.S. Bach and Brahms?
$3,601
AndreaWho are J.S. Bach Bach & + Handel?
$9,205
Johann Sebastian Bach & George Frederic Handel')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '2 of the world\'s greatest Baroque composers, they were born within a month of each other in Germany in 1685 but never met')

tr.td: COMPOSERS
2 of the world's greatest Baroque composers, they were born within a month of each other in Germany in 1685 but never met
Kristin
Daniel
Andrea
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $18,605
Kristin
Daniel
Andrea

23 R
(including 1 DD),
7 W
(including 2 DDs)
